textBeforeTable: The following songs achieved the highest chart positions in the charts of 1991. Biggest hit singles[edit] World Outside – The Psychedelic Furs World on a String – Red Allen Watershed - Grant McLennan War Master – Bolt Thrower Volume One – Sleep Voices – Kenny Thomas Unsane – Unsane Tossing Seeds – Superchunk Themes and Dreams – The Shadows (compilation) Surprise – Crystal Waters Suit suit...hehehe – Slank Struck by Lightning – Graham Parker Stranger in This Town – Richie Sambora Stars Crash Down – Hue and Cry Spirit Electricity (EP) – Bad Brains Soul Show: Live at Delta 88 – Joan Osborne (live) Silver Lining – Nils Lofgren Sexplosion! – My Life with the Thrill Kill Kult
